column4: good evening, could someone help me with installing World of Warcraft?
with cedega?
with Wine
dunno if WoW works with wine out of the box
i've installed it but it doesnt seem to work very well
i'm using cedega and it works great
do you have to pay for that one?
yea $5/month
is it worth it?
depends on how much gaming you do
you can use it for all kinds of windows apps?
WoW is really the only game i play, and it's supported well b/c it's so popular
sounds good, will go look into it :)
so it's worth it for me...i spend a lot more than $5/month on beer/liquor so...
aye, it's not very much money so should be cool
it's all relative
what realm do you play?
used to be on Boulderfist now on Auchindoun
my alliance characters are on sen'jin, horde on hellscream
did you take a free transfer or something?
no i rerolled in TBC with my crazy danish friends
you still here?
